- Не в состоянии прожить и дня без  [b] "ВАЛЕЛЕВАЛЕМ НА ГЕЛИКЕ" и "ОЙ МАМА МЕНТ НА МЕНЯ ХОЗУЕТ"?[/b]

Quite good for a CS but Global Offensive is better.

Tak jo, vzhledem k tomu, že mi furt padá  CS:GO a myslel jsem, že s bráchou by jsme to mohli hrát,zkusil jsem Source ...
A asi raději strpím padání GO.
Grafika hry je otřesná! Hra je dost stará, pamatuji si jak tehdy to byl obří skok od 1.6, ale dneska už fakt ne. A nejde ani o to, že to vypadá jako posraná prdel namočená do rašeliny, ale spíš mne sralo, jak díky nekvalitní grafice nejste schopni rozeznat roh zdi od zdi v pozadí.
Co se týče zbraní, je to jiné, prostě jiné rozptyly a vážně už nemám chuť se učit nové. A opravdu nevím čím to bylo, ale soupeř byl ještě odolnější než v GO. Asi jde o zvyk, ale nevím proč se učit starou hru.
Co se chatařů týče, asi byli, jsou a budou v každé hře, V GO je ale můžu alespoň napráskat pro dobrý pocit.
Shrnuto podtrženo .. hru jsem odinstaloval a pokud mne někdy bude lákat koupit 1.6, prosím, zastavte mne někdo.
Its like...Better than call of duty
No. Only have it because garry's mod
This game is a classic multi-player FPS. I compare every other multi-player FPS I play to this one because it's sort of the standard for me.
I used to play this game a lot. I havent played it in a while, but I should get back into it. It was a fun game.

CSGO may be the most played Counter-Strike Game to date but (in my opinion) CSS (Counter-Strike: Source) is the best counter-strike game to date. It's much more simpler and it doesn't have retarded game modes like Danger Zone. I kind of wish Valve made competitive matchmaking for CSS instead of us paying for ESEA or something like that. Even though, this game might seem outdated and buggy today, its still an amazing game even though people just buy the game just for textures of Garry's Mod. If you are just buying this game just for Garry's Mod, please play this game, if you like competitive shooters like CSGO. It's worth a try.
I really liked the counter-strike stress test, Best part of the game, The only reason you should buy it.
Awesome game, beeing playing it since it has came out. Its one of the fps shooter that you will always come back too. Great Job Valve!

Absolutely love this game. Very fun with friends and playing by yourself

Perfect game:
-Tons of gamemodes
-Editable gun's cammo
-V(alve)A(nti)C(cheat)
-Awesome server filter
-Incredible community
-Not requiered 6GB of RAM to play (e.e CoD Dogs)
-Made by VALVe

Bad things:

-Sniper rifles aren't very real

I once was a good CS player.

The Scout and P228 were my weapons, Inferno and Scud my maps.

Les Boulets and United Kommandos my favourite servers, Tugas and Russians my favourite players.

Hectic Gun Games for the raep, 50 player deathmatches for the lulz.

But since March 2011, the prince has lied there in my Library; I now play TF2.

Good night sweet prince.

A must have for any PC gamer.

+ 

Best Hl2 Game for Surfing.

Aside from some camping(which happens in every FPS unfortunately), this is an excellent shooter game. Time seems to fly away when you are playing. It can probably ruin your fucking life if you get hooked on the game. Plus, I played mainly in cs_office. I still have other maps to play which is great. The best part of this game is the gameplay of course. I don't really give a fuck about the graphics, the porn posted by the other users make up for it :D. Overall, it is an excellent game that you can play for a long time and still enjoy it because there are many modded servers to play(zombies, hunger games, something about surfing,etc).
If you need someone to tell you that this is a good game. You should probably not be here.
Good old classic shooter. Always fun whether for 10 minutes, or 20 hour stints. Plenty of mods/custom maps to hold anyone over
This is a game i would reccomend to anyone. It perfectly blends FPS and teamplay dynamics into an addicting and extensivley fun multiplayer shooter
